S.FORM: Claude Akins kawas tay 1926, ryax sa tay 25 nqu tay 5, Claude Akins, squliq na Bunge'. (wal mhuqil sa kawas tay 1994) qnxan nya(qyanux nya) Akins htagan beh sa cyacyaco na'sing.mrkyas beh Tiannaco petput qalang qasa. hiya ga te sazing cinbwanan mciriq mtzyaw squ menteng ru beriping na hetay Amirika. masoq mciriq lga.1949 kawas tmasoq mqwas biru beh sipe hopa pqwasan biru. 1953 kawas aycings hya ga mhtuw beh (From Here to Eternity). Claude Akins mhuqil beh cyalipuniya pasatina.
